Header: Army Troops Join Fire Fighters at Madampitiya
Content: A group of  thirty 6 Gemunu Watch (GW) troops of the 142 Brigade under the  Security Force Headquarters - West are currently engaged in the control of a raging fire that has broken out in a garbage dump at Madampitiya - Mutwal area after the Army assistance was sought around 02.00 p.m on Saturday (18). As this report was filed, Army troops together with fire fighters in the Fire Brigade and volunteers are trying to bring the spreading fire under control.
